name: awesome-skills
description: A curated collection of AI agent skills from GitHub repositories - by RanBOT Labs

scripts.scrape:build: cd scraper && npm run build && npm run scrape
scripts.setup: cd scraper && npm install && cd ../web && npm install
scripts.update-skills: npm run scrape && npm run copy-data
scripts.copy-data: mkdir -p web/public/data/skills && cp data/skills.json web/public/data/skills.json && cp data/search-index.json web/public/data/search-index.json && cp -r data/skills/* web/public/data/skills/

author: RanBOT Labs <hello@ranbot.online>
